Message 1486 of 4024
If it’s not too much trouble... I would love to know if you will reconsider your earlier decision not to try a baby step towards a more peaceful, safe,
time boxed detente for the Moyer’s. I far prefer that and will change any plans to give peace a shot. But if you are still not willing, I’ll try and schedule
something else.
Sent:02/17/2024 at 09:29 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/17/2024 at 04:34 PM)
Subject:Re: Today
Message 1487 of 4024
The irony is neither of us know how to stop these. I did not know how to stop them when we’re on a shared account. You don’t know how to stop
spamming me with them now.
But somehow, in this crazy fucked up world. It means that I am digitally monitoring you. And that means DV. It’s beyond crazy. Especially since it
was all set up to just protect you and our kids.
How the legal system perverts network security and parental control into domestic violence now is beyond fucked up and we both, in our sane mind
know that. How is that used against me?
